title: AI Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics dashboard for product and growth teams with LLM-powered summaries.
content: This dashboard ingests product usage data and surfaces features driving retention using LLM-based insight generation.

title: Lead Qualification Agent
description: Autonomous agent that reads inbound leads and qualifies them before they reach sales.
content: The agent connects to CRM and email inboxes, enriches leads with external data, and routes high-intent leads to the right representative.

title: Vector Search Service
description: Thin API on top of a vector DB (Pinecone / Qdrant) for semantic search workloads.
content: The service ingests documents, builds embeddings, and exposes a retrieval API tuned for latency and recall.

title: Marketing Experiment Studio
description: Landing page generator that runs multivariate experiments with AI-written copy.
content: Marketers can spin up pages, push them to production, and get auto-generated experiment reports using LLMs.

title: Support Knowledge Search
description: Unified search across tickets, docs, and internal notes backed by a vector index.
content: Support agents can search by intent instead of keywords, powered by embeddings and a vector database.
